alert.note: Alert for Bullitt; Jefferson; Shelby; Spencer (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 22 at 4:59PM EDT until June 22 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Spencer County in central Kentucky... West central Shelby County in central Kentucky... Southeastern Jefferson County in central Kentucky... Northern Bullitt County in central Kentucky... * Until 530 PM EDT. * At 459 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Middletown to Pioneer Village to near Shepherdsville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jeffersontown, Shepherdsville, Pioneer Village, Hollow Creek, Hollyvilla, Spring Mill, Highview, Fern Creek, Okolona and Minor Lane Heights. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
